column4: In gnome 3.2, how do I open the empathy buddy window after I close it?
jokn: Not that I see, no.

I haven't used gnome 3.2, but prior to gnome 3 the empathy icon was in the "tray" or on the panel.  So the icon is nowhere on scree? Other than relaunching the app, which it should just bring up the active window, I don't know of any other way.
Yeah I don't see much.  Oh well, thanks!
